info.author: Octopus Energy
info.description:
# octotools - Utilities for the UK energy market from Octopus Energy

This repo groups together a bunch of useful utilities for the UK energy market, made with love by the Octopus Energy team.

CI status:

[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/octotools/tree/master.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/octotools/tree/master)


## Contributing

Create and activate a virtualenv then:

    $ make

Test package with:

    $ make test

and:

    $ make lint  

Release to PyPI by:

1. Bumping the version in `setup.py`

2. Running: 

        $ make publish
info.name: octotools
info.summary: Utilities for the UK energy market from Octopus Energy
info.html_description:
# octotools - Utilities for the UK energy market from Octopus Energy

This repo groups together a bunch of useful utilities for the UK energy market, made with love by the Octopus Energy team.

CI status:

[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/octotools/tree/master.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/octotools/tree/master)

## Contributing

Create and activate a virtualenv then:

$ make

Test package with:

$ make test

and:

$ make lint

Release to PyPI by:

  1. Bumping the version in setup.py

  2. Running:

    $ make publish
